channel.title: No HUD, cannot jump high enough, weird sprinting/crouching
channel.description:
Amongst other things.
So I've had the HEV suit for a while now, got a gun, and have been killed, with no HUD. I don't know how much ammo, health or charge that I have. This is universal, not just in one spot. I've restarted, adjusted visual settings, all to no avail.
Also I have found out that I can not jump high enough to climb on top of certain crates in order to get to airducts/climb over pipes, etc. I simply can't jump high enough, I've tried stacking barrels and anything I can, also to no avail.
And then there's the running thing, I can't sprint if I press shift while walking. I have to stop walking, press shift, then move forward to run.
With Crouching, if I press ctrl while standing still, nothing happens, I have to move forward just a little bit to go into crouch.
All these happen through out the game, not at specific parts.
If you need any more information, let me know.
EDIT: Subtitles also do not show up, for anything, CC or Dialogue.

item.dc:creator: MannyStillwagon
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Maybe the HUD is falling outside your FOV for some reason. Have you tried adjusting the resolution or running the game in windowed mode?

I have. No dice. That would make sense, except that the crosshair is missing as well. I have messed with about every setting that seems possibly associated. Now I’m re-installing just to see if my file got corrupted somehow. Thanks for the help.
